name: The World of Untitled
description:
The World of Untitled was my first full project as a game developer, having had it successfully funded on Kickstarter.

Kickstarter here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/925876373/the...

A 2D point and click adventure that follows you as you are thrown into the world of Untitled, where you will journey through a mystical world of strange beings, bad puns and 8-bit merman cowboys!
